Key Match Events: Monk hit a 3-pointer with 4:21 remaining to regain the lead
The Kings went on a 20-10 run to regain the lead
Post-Match Reflections: The Kings won their third in a row
The Grizzlies surged back to tie the game 100-all on two free throws by Jackson with 1:27 left in the quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zach Edey returned from a two-game absence due to a concussion and had nine points and seven rebounds off the bench
Ja Morant and Marcus Smart did not play
Keegan Murray missed his second straight game for the Kings
Kings guard Devin Carter made his debut with the team in the first quarter
